textContent:
If you're opening this, I hope you're already smiling, because just thinking of you brings the biggest, goofiest grin to my face. ğŸ¤­

But okay, let’s be real…
Remember those video calls where I couldn't stop smiling  when you used to sing for me or your half-asleep voice? ğŸ«£
Or when I'd randomly go "I love you" like ten times in a row, especially on those days when my hormones decided to turn me into a clingy love-struck mess? Yeah… that version of me was extra, but also very real. And you never once made me feel weird about it. You just behaved more obsessed than me and somehow I fell harder.ğŸ˜­ğŸ©·

You've seen me soft, sleepy, chatty, dramatic, and completely in love, and you say my smile is your favorite. So here I am, sending you some of that same energy back. ğŸ‘€

So if today feels heavy, or if you're just tired of the world...pause. ğŸ¤§
Take a deep breath.ğŸ¥º
Smile.ğŸ¤­
Because I’m here, loving you from across the distance and saving up all my best smiles just for you.ğŸ˜ŒğŸ¤­

You’re my favorite laugh, my favorite call, my favorite comfort. ğŸ©·

Now go drink some water, send me a snap, and don’t do anything dumb.
(Unless it’s something dumb with me.) ğŸ«£
title: Open when you need a laugh.
textContentHtml:
If you're opening this, I hope you're already smiling, because just thinking of you brings the biggest, goofiest grin to my face. ğŸ¤­


But okay, let’s be real…

Remember those video calls where I couldn't stop smiling  when you used to sing for me or your half-asleep voice? ğŸ«£

Or when I'd randomly go "I love you" like ten times in a row, especially on those days when my hormones decided to turn me into a clingy love-struck mess? Yeah… that version of me was extra, but also very real. And you never once made me feel weird about it. You just behaved more obsessed than me and somehow I fell harder.ğŸ˜­ğŸ©·
